title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: When exporting a zip file, the checkboxes used for selecting projects should display a busy cursor during the updating process.
OB: When exporting a zip file with multiple projects in the workspace, the checkboxes do not show any indication that they are being updated.
EB: The checkboxes should display a busy cursor to indicate that they are being updated during the export process.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a workspace with multiple projects. 2. Go to the export Zip option. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose specific file types. 5. Press OK to initiate the export process.
